title: BetrokkeneBijKlantContact to KlantContactMoment item
description: Makes sure there are not multiple variants of the same categorie.

mapping.contactmoment: {% if embedded.klantcontact|default %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.klantContactToContactmomentItem.mapping.json', embedded.klantcontact)._self.self }}{% elseif klantcontact|default and klantcontact is not iterable %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.klantContactToContactmomentItem.mapping.json', getObject(klantcontact))._self.self }}{% endif %}
mapping.klant: {% if embedded.partij|default %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.partijToKlantItem.mapping.json', embedded.partij)._self.self }}{% elseif partij|default and partij is not iterable %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.partijToKlantItem.mapping.json', getObject(partij))._self.self }}{% endif %}
mapping.embedded.contactmoment: {% if embedded.klantcontact|default %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.klantContactToContactmomentItem.mapping.json', embedded.klantcontact)|json_encode }}{% elseif klantcontact|default and klantcontact is not iterable %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.klantContactToContactmomentItem.mapping.json', getObject(klantcontact))|json_encode }}{% endif %}
mapping.embedded.klant: {% if embedded.partij|default %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.partijToKlantItem.mapping.json', embedded.partij)|json_encode }}{% elseif partij|default and partij is not iterable %}{{ map('https://commongateway.nl/mapping/klant.partijToKlantItem.mapping.json', getObject(partij))|json_encode }}{% endif %}
